assumptions: Default dynamics.i0=0.05 rad is used as the baseline inclination controlling collision-kernel scale height H ~ i a; a literature anchor or empirical justification is not documented.
Citations needed for the statement that weak tidal dissipation for Deimos makes orbital circularization difficult in capture scenarios.
Definition and units for r_d in Canup & Salmon (2018) need explicit reference.
Need explicit reference for the claim that long-term models typically omit surface-loss sink terms beyond infall and viscous spreading (Salmon & Canup 2012; Canup & Salmon 2018).

Need a reference for the claim that a thick post-impact atmosphere (steam/impact-generated gas) can delay Mars surface cooling via greenhouse and/or convection, extending high-T conditions on year-plus timescales.

Need a reference (or justification) for modeling post-impact radiation as emerging from an atmospheric photosphere with (R_eff, T_eff) differing from the surface, and for how this changes the luminosity relevant to radiation pressure.

Need a reference (or quantitative estimate) for the possibility that an IR-opaque post-impact atmosphere/gas environment attenuates irradiation of the disk and suppresses radiation-pressure-driven blowout.

Need a reference (or derivation) supporting the claim that effective blowout residence time / reaccretion probability depends on orbital elements (eccentricity/inclination/phase at production) for post-impact Martian debris disks.

Need a reference (or calculation plan) for the claim that selective blowout from specific size/radius ranges can remove angular momentum in a way that materially affects long-term viscous spreading / satellite formation outcomes.
Policy for whether planetary infall is included in ΔM_in or treated separately is not fixed.
Definition of a_eq,max and its relationship to r_d is not fixed; needs alignment with long-term model notation.
Exact definition/time reference for M_in in Canup & Salmon (2018) needs citation.
Aggregation method for computing M_in^SPH from SPH outputs needs to be specified and referenced.
Definition of transition start time t0 for long-term model handoff not fixed.
Symbol definitions in transition glossary are pending literature confirmation.
Arakawa et al. (1991) entry notes optical constants 0.0173–50 μm but table availability is not confirmed.
Ordering between shielding Phi interpolation, tau=1 clipping, and tau_gate application in shielding/gate logic needs explicit reference or rationale.
